snippet: When lawmakers return to Springfield on Tuesday, mental health advocates, whose programs have suffered deep budget cuts, will be among the groups that see the session as an opportunity to ask for money.
lead_paragraph: When lawmakers return to Springfield on Tuesday, mental health advocates, whose programs have suffered deep budget cuts, will be among the groups that see the session as an opportunity to ask for money.

headline.main: Mental Health Advocates Face an Uphill Battle
headline.print_headline: Mental Health Advocates Face an Uphill Battle
